graph.topic: Lessons with teachers versus others sources

nodes.text: students learn far more from their teachers than from other source
not only do teachers teach us knowlegde but also the skills to tell right from wrong
many students learn from Internet after class
They all enrich our daily lives
teachers teach students how to write, read and calculate since they are in kindergarten
when they are in primary school, teachers teach them more further knowledge, like writing skills and using computers
It is teachers that help them with obstacles in schooling
students gain most of the knowledge through teachers and learn what is right and wrong with the assistance of teachers
students at schools and universities still learn much more from lessons with teachers
students learn far more from other sources, such as the Internet and television
within this sources students learn lots of things which they can't learn in classes
They can only input some key words and google it, and then there are numberless articles and websites related to it
they contend that good television programmes do teach students
Discovery Channel has many instructive episodes
Students have knowledge of others cultrues, outer space etc
